column1: The Pit Room////The Pit Room is exactly what it sounds like - a place for a good meal with no fancy fixings. They have plenty of parking (which is a miracle in this area)
column2: a bar next door (where you can also park)
column3: a get in line and order your meal system
column4: and plenty of goodness to choose from. Before I get into the food they offer
column5: I have to say I was SUPER pumped that they carried cream soda
column6: Mexican coke and other bottled drinks that are usually hard to come by in restaurants.
